title: Who Should You Believe When Chatbots Go Wild?
description: Microsoft and others ask us to ignore their glitchy bots’ pleas for personhood. But we need better explanations—and guardrails.

title: Amazon Has a Donkey Meat Problem
description: The online retailer sells products meant for human consumption that contain donkey meat. A new lawsuit claims that’s illegal in California.

title: Ukraine’s War Brings Autonomous Weapons to the Front Lines
description: Drones that can find their own targets already exist, making machine-versus-machine conflict just a software update away.

title: How Ukraine’s Trains Kept Running Despite Bombs, Blackouts, and Biden
description: Since Russia’s full-scale assault began, Ukraine’s railways evacuated 4 million people and brought 300 foreign delegations to Kyiv.
